alert.note: Alert for Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 20 at 11:20AM EST until November 21 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches north of the NY Thruway...and 2 to 9 inches south of the Thruway. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Southern Oneida county. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snowfall rates could approach 1 to 2 inches per hour today. Rates will decrease later this evening as the snow lifts northward. Snow will quickly accumulate on roadways, making traveling difficult. Strong wind gusts will result in blowing snow and whiteout conditions. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4362 7509 4359 7519 4342 7550 4348 7581 4342 7586 4327 7586 4324 7565 4325 7550 4326 7517 4332 7509 TIME Y22M11D20T1200Z-Y22M11D20T1800Z COORD...4345 7509 4350 7539 4342 7550 4348 7581 4342 7586 4316 7588 4316 7567 4312 7568 4304 7520 4312 7514 TIME Y22M11D20T1800Z-Y22M11D21T0000Z COORD...4335 7563 4344 7567 4348 7581 4342 7586 4318 7587 4316 7567 4311 7565 4303 7551 4306 7536 4323 7534 TIME Y22M11D21T0000Z-Y22M11D21T0600Z
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
